More than one billion Indians: Is this is a problem or a sea of opportunities? Please take a stand and discuss

In my view, one billion Indians are a sea of oppurtunitines.  In the world china stood ahead of India in terms of population as well as growth. When china is able to handle more population and able to facilitate growth, in my opinion, India can also use its population for its development. There are various factors taken into considerition for treating it to be a oppurtunity.

Firstly,Demographic dividend of india is good. Demographic dividend of any country is number of young individuals in age group of 10years to 25 years when comapred with people of elder age. For India this number is very high when compared to many other countries. Good demographic dividend indicates that the country is having good number of population which is fit to work. This means more work force which many developed countreis need. This attracts major investments from foreign multinationals which is a good source of finance for development and growth.
